name: Dungeon Grid
description:
Help your character navigate through the levels in this grid-based puzzle game. He can only move vertically and horizontally and he is not very good at stopping.

When you complete a new level you will earn Character Token points, when you have completed enough levels you will be rewarded with a Character Token that you can use to unlock a new character.

The WebGL version is a demo with a limited amount of level and no saving, if you want more levels and saving try out the full version on Google Play.

The game is currently under development, so expect bugs and progress will be reset from time to time. If you have any feedback feel free to contact me at  feedback@skm-games.no or post it here on itch.io.
